content: *inspired by the classic look of sailor s knots this dishcloth is perfect for adding a touch of nautical flair to your kitchen decor yarnspirations * --- *skill level * easy --- **materials ** lily® sugar n cream® 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yds soft ecru 01004 *1 ball* --- *also available at jo-ann 1 * --- 1 http //demandware edgesuite net/aamm_prd/on/demandware static/sites-joann-site/sites-joann-project-catalog/default/dwd50d3c4f/images/hi-res/project/pdf/0953863p40 pdf
